snippet.title: Game Boy Color Longplay [166] Jim Henson's Bear in the Big Blue House (US)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Reinc

Jim Henson's Bear in Big Blue House is a compilation of mini-games aimed at children. It was published by Ubisoft in 2002 on Game Boy Color and PlayStation. It is based on the American children's television series of the same name.

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
